name: Smoked Haddock & Leek Risotto
recipeIngredient: 4 young leeks (halved lengthwise and thinly sliced),
recipeInstructions: 1. Put the haddock in a heatproof dish and just cover with boiling water. Cover with clingfilm and leave for 10 minutes. Flake into decent-sized chunks.
2. Meanwhile, heat 2 tbsp oil and a knob of butter in a wide shallow pan then add the leeks. Cook slowly for 10 minutes until completely softened.
3. Turn up the heat, add the rice and stir to coat the grains.
4. Pour in the wine and stir until absorbed.
5. Add the stock, a ladleful at a time, stirring each lot in, until the rice is just tender and creamy.
6. Stir in the haddock and chives and serve.
